section1.title: A Trusted Agency for Leading Enterprises and Growing Businesses
section1.subtitle:
Top Korean companies such as Samsung Electronics, KT, SK, LS Electric, Mando, Korea Networks, Shinsegae I&C, BR Korea (Baskin Robbins), NH Investment & Securities, Coway,
MG Community Credit Cooperatives, Yuhan-Kimberly, Dong-A Pharmaceutical, and Daemyung Resort have trusted Noor with their projects.

section2.subtitle:
We create customized services not only for consumer-oriented platforms such as e-commerce, real estate, recruitment, community, campaigns, and sharing services,
but also for enterprise solutions including bio, smart factory, signal processing, machine learning, and asset management.

section3.title: An Agency with a 100% Project Completion Rate
section3.subtitle:
Since our founding, every client project has been completed successfully,
with zero cancellations for any reason — a 100% completion record.

privacy.title: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information
privacy.description: This is a guide on the collection and use of personal information.

section1.title: 1. Purpose and Items of Personal Information Collection
section1.content:
Collection Purpose: To collect your project budget, period, development method, etc. for accurate consultation.

Required Items: Company name, contact person name, email, phone number, project information, budget, schedule, selection method

Optional Items: Project name and content

Collection Method: Personal information collection on the website

section2.title: 2. Use and Retention Period of Personal Information
section2.content:
In principle, the information will be destroyed without delay after the purpose of collecting and using personal information is achieved.

However, if it is necessary to preserve according to the provisions of related laws such as the Consumer Protection Act, the company will keep customer information for a certain period set by the related laws.

In this case, the company will use the stored information only for the purpose of storage.

section3.title: 3. Right to Refuse Consent and Disadvantages of Refusal
section3.content:
Consent to the collection and use of essential personal information is essential for the request, so you must agree to make a request.
